chunk_metadata.created_by: Enhanced Markdown Chunker with Comprehensive Context

works.Name: Marien-Passion
works.Long Description: Eight-movement chamber-orchestra passion setting: 1. Mariae Verkündigung Lento molto tranquillo, 2. Christi Geburt, 3. Choral der Anbetung Sehr ruhig und zart, 4. Wiegenlied und Weise der Andacht Andante molto sostenuto, 5. Choral des Dankes Sehr ruhig und schlicht, 6. Lieder Marias Mesto e misterioso, 7. Choral des Schmerzes Mit größtem Ausdruck, 8. Verklärung Marias Adagio molto tranquillo.

works.Name: Symphonie
works.Notes: One-movement form: Thema - Introduktion - Allegro energico - Adagio - Adagio - Scherzo - Finale. Awarded 1st prize at the 1961 GEDOK International Women Composers Competition, Mannheim. Also exists in a string-quartet version.

works.Name: Musica Larga
Instrumentation: Streichquartett und Klarinette bzw. Streichorchester und Klarinette
works.Notes: Dedicated to Hermann Abendroth. Composed 1938; orchestral version 1944.

works.Name: Drei Rilke-Gesänge
works.Notes: Orchestral version of the 1948/49 piano-accompanied songs. Movements: 1. Der Schwan Lento molto sostenuto, 2. Das Lied vom Meer Moderato molto tranquillo, quasi una fantasia, 3. Der Tod ist groß (Schluss-Stück) Andante maestoso. Dedications: Carl Friedberg (No. 1), Ada Rettberg (No. 2), In memoriam Rainer Zipperling (No. 3).

works.Name: Fünf Lieder nach Texten aus 'Des Knaben Wunderhorn'
works.Long Description: Five songs on Wunderhorn texts: 1. Frau Nachtigall, 2. Die Meise, 3. Der Maria Geburt, 4. Wiegenlied einer alten frommen Magd, 5. Engelsgesang.

works.Name: Vier winzige Wunderhorn-Lieder
works.Long Description: Four miniatures on Wunderhorn texts: 1. Maikäferlied, 2. Geh, du schwarze Amsel, 3. Der Sperling, 4. Der Buzzemann.

works.Name: Stimmungen eines Fauns
works.Notes: Dedicated to Anita Rée. Three pieces: 1. Klage Langsam, klagend, 2. Schalkslaune Schalkisch frech, mit etwas täppischem Humor, 3. Schwermut Langsam, mit schwerem Ausdruck.

works.Name: Suite für Violoncello
works.Long Description: Five-movement solo suite: 1. Präludium Andante molto sostenuto, 2. Bourrée, 3. Gavotte (Tempo I Allegretto sostenuto / Tempo II Andante con grazia), 4. Aria Largo con gran espressione, 5. Gigue Allegro moderato, energico.

works.Name: Drei Rilke-Gesänge
works.Notes: Composed 1948/1949. Movements: 1. Der Schwan (Lento molto sostenuto), 2. Das Lied vom Meer (Moderato molto tranquillo, quasi una fantasia), 3. Der Tod ist groß (Schluss-Stück) (Andante maestoso). Dedications: Carl Friedberg (No. 1), Ada Rettberg (No. 2), In memoriam Rainer Zipperling (No. 3). Also exists in orchestral version.

works.Name: Vier Puppen
works.Notes: Four miniatures: 1. Der Holzsoldat, 2. Der Hampelmann, 3. Das Puppenmädchen, 4. Der Harlekin. Also arranged for wind quintet (1966) and as Kleine Suite for flute and piano by Jost Michaels (1998).

works.Name: Sonate
works.Notes: Dedicated to Herrn Theodor Behrens in Hamburg. Three movements: 1. Markig, 2. Sehr langsam. Frei im Zeitmaß, 3. Lebhaft, aber nicht schnell.

works.Name: Walzerreigen
works.Notes: Dedicated to her esteemed friend J. Kwast in gratitude.

works.Name: Variationen über ein eigenes Thema fis-moll
works.Notes: Dedicated to the memory of Vera Jaborg. Eight variations on an original theme.

works.Name: Passacaglia f-moll
works.Notes: Also orchestrated by Frank Wohlfahrt with added coda (1933) and arranged for organ (1977).

works.Name: Kadenzen zu Klavierkonzerten von W.A. Mozart
works.Long Description: Cadenzas for Mozart piano concertos KV 467, 482, 503, 537 (first and third movements).

chunk_info.processing_notes: Extracted all clearly delineated complete works with at least title and composer. Cadenzas treated as a single work entry. Both versions of Drei Rilke-Gesänge (chamber and orchestral) listed separately.
